mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from reservationlist where userid=#{id} and pooltype='탈래요' order by idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{startnum} and rnum<=#{endnum}
select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from reservationlist where userid=#{id} and pooltype='타세요' order by idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{startnum} and rnum<=#{endnum}
select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from poolmasterstatus where masterid=#{id} and reqcount>=1 order by idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{startnum} and rnum<=#{endnum}
select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from poolmemberstatus where memberid like #{id} order by idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{startnum} and rnum<=#{endnum}
select count(*) from (select * from reservationlist where userid=#{id} and pooltype='탈래요')
select count(*) from (select * from reservationlist where userid=#{id} and pooltype='타세요')
select members from poolmasterstatus where addidx=#{addidx}
select count(*) from poolmemberstatus where memberid=#{id}
select count(*) from poolmasterstatus where masterid=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into poolmasterstatus ( idx, aimidx, masterid, mans, nowmans, status, members, reqcount ) values ( poolmasterstatus_idx.nextval, #{aimidx}, #{masterid}, #{mans}, 0, '모집중', '-', 0 )
insert into poolmemberstatus ( idx, memberid, aimidx, status, mans ) values ( poolmasterstatus_idx.nextval, #{memberid}, #{aimidx}, '수락 대기 중', 1 )
mapper.update: update poolmasterstatus set nowmans=nowmans+#{nowmans}, members=members||'-'||#{members}, reqcount=reqcount+1 where aimidx=#{aimidx}
update poolmasterstatus set members='-', inmembers=members, reqcount=0 where idx=#{idx}
update poolmasterstatus set members=rtrim(members,'-'||#{members}), inmembers=inmembers||'-'||#{members}, reqcount=reqcount-1 where idx=#{idx}
update poolmemberstatus set status='예약 완료' where memberid=#{members} and aimidx = (select aimidx from poolmasterstatus where aimidx=#{aimidx})
update poolmemberstatus set status='예약 완료' where aimidx=#{aimidx} and status='수락 대기 중'
update poolmasterstatus set status='예약 완료' where idx=#{idx} and mans=nowmans
